person.persName: William Polk, Sr. (Crittenden County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Crittenden County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Jemima Polk. Father of Mary J. Polk, James Polk, Sarah A. Polk, Margaret S. Polk, William Polk, Jr., and John Polk. Farmer in Crittenden County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, West Half, p. 17; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Fredonia, p. 15.
